wikipedia_page.main: Erica Rutherford (1 February 1923, in Edinburgh – 11 April 2008, in Charlottetown) was a British-Canadian artist, filmmaker and writer. She received the Father Adrien Arsenault Senior Arts Award (2001) and was elected to the Royal Canadian Academy of Arts (1999).

response: * Erica Rutherford artist, filmmaker and writer
